ygData.subject: Questions about FEAR PLANE....
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, Bards are an adventurous sort (usually) so I thought I would pick the minds of my comrades in song. (smile). The Fear Plane... great loot, great XP... HARD
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, Bards are an adventurous sort (usually) so I thought I would pick the
minds of my comrades in song. (smile).

The Fear Plane... great loot, great XP... HARD monsters.... or so that's all
I've "heard".

You enter the zone, instant death. You enter the zone, instand backstabs for
400-800 points. You enter the zone, you can't leave except by Evac and even
THAT only works 10% of the time. The list of horror stories goes on.

WHAT is TRUTH? Can you fight at the zone and flee if it gets bad? How
"different" does magic work? Do our songs work??

ANY info and tales appreciated!

Tallonn - 38th Verse
Bertox
